sequence: <size=51>「On my path of conquest, having yet to witness the light of dawn that I seeked,</size>
<size=51>I found myself lost deep amidst the woodlands; dim, dark, and dreary were they</size>
<size=51>Entombed within the darkness of those dense copses, I stood alone, trembling with fear,</size>
<size=51>and I could do naught but curse myself for my ignorance and my foolishness</size>
<size=51>O, when did I stray from the path of righteousness? How much time has passed?」</size>

scripts.say: No... Impossible...!
The Sardegna Empire was under attack, and Taranto harbor was dyed a burning red.
How was I unable... to foresee an attack like this...!
Though the harbor's anti-air defenses were firing round after round into the skies, they could not stop the Royal Navy's aerial onslaught.
How were they able to mobilize their aerial squadrons at night...?!
The ships ablaze painted the harbor an infernal red. It was like staring into the maw of hell itself.
Città Eterna, Capital of the Sardegna Empire - 3 Days Prior
There's no way the Sirens are supposed to be here in the Mediterranean Sea. Are you certain your information is correct?
Yes! I am certain of it! A large Siren fleet has amassed near the Empire's southern border to the sea!
What are those Iron Blood bastards doing, allowing the Sirens to advance this deep into our territory...
(One of our demands for joining the Crimson Axis was that the safety of the Mediterranean would be secured...)
(I was already apprehensive of them when the Sirens dismantled the Vichya Dominion, but now they advance upon us...)
Really, Veneto? History has shown us time and time again that the fruit left for those who blindly place their faith in others is bitter indeed.
Littorio...
Since when has grumbling solved any problems, Miss Eternal Flagship?
Our response should be simple. Gaze upon our glorious imperial fleet, and turn your eyes upon me.
We have the most technologically advanced fleet on the face of the continent.
Now look across the land and the sea.
Our land is a hallowed cradle that has given birth to great civilizations and timeless cultures.
If we wish to reclaim Sardegna's fabled birthright, just give me the word, Veneto.
And by our own hands, the world shall know of our glory.
R-right...
So, waste no more time being indecisive! I shall personally lead the Imperial Fleet to annihilate these intruders!
But... I...
Ah, you are worried about the Royal Navy, aren't you? You fear the same thing that happened to Vichya will happen to us?
If we sit here and do nothing, we will end up just like those Vichya battleships, trophies adorning the Royal Navy's mantle.
Moreover, the fact that the Sirens have approached in our waters might be a blessing in disguise.
Because now, neither the Iron Blood nor Iris Libre are able to make a move in our territory.
And even if they could, they would have no way of assessing our naval might.
So, what do you say? Shall we seize this opportunity to partake in an act on the world stage...
... and crush the Sirens in a show of Sardegna's might?
